A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was tremendously ambitious. It desired to take Star Wars is a new\, darker\, and more realistic direction. And it succeeded. A lot of Star Wars fans are going to hate it\, because\, to put it simply\, this is a 2017 movie and not a 1980 movie. It's not perfect\, its not predictable\, but I think its quite a few steps above the previous movie which was derivative to a fault. Every major controversial decision it made will serve to improve the trilogy as a whole and make for a more fascinating story. It's important to remember how controversial the second movie in the original trilogy was upon release\, and how the third movie recontextualized so well that its considered to be the best of the 3.
